data.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 5) [Vibration] Count (max 10)
[EndSkill] If there are any targets in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, heal 10 SP

passiveList.desc:
Allies gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill or Coin effects (2 times per turn)
- If the ally's target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead
- Effect does not stack with E.G.O Gifts of an identical effect.
passiveList.name: A Gaze in the Shadows
